fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Woodchip- (Night) Target a player. They require one fewer vote to be lynched tomorrow.
Market Crash- (Night) [Cheat] Choose a role subalignment. You will Basic Attack a random player with that subalignment.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Woodchip cannot be used if fewer than 7 players are alive.
-Market Crash can target Cogs but like why would you want to??
